roles.title: Software Engineer
responsibilities: Utilized languages, frameworks, and tools, such as Java, JavaScript, Node.js, React, Express, and Flutter to develop, test, and implement web, mobile, and native applications.
Successfully developed multiple backend and frontend systems.
Deployed specific programming technologies, developed programming codes, fixed technical errors, and processed data.

roles.title: Engineering Intern
roles.desc: Automation engineer for the CI/CD SWE team tasked with maintaining Apple's testing systems
accomplishments: Minimized queue times to achieve over 90% availability and overall site reliability by 30% by implementing automation systems and workflows to proactively detect potential failures in hosts.
Utilized Ansible to configure 100,000+ devices under test for deployment on testing clusters
responsibilities: Built-out and maintained multiple CI/CD testing labs across 5 locations
Developed and maintained scripts used for core infrastructure monitoring and task automation as well as to monitor and maintain 10,000+ iOS/macOS device clusters.

roles.title: Data Analyst
responsibilities: Designed and built statistical analysis models to create a predictive analysis of resources and impactful visual models.
Collected and cleansed and analyzed large sets of structured and unstructured data using R data cleaning techniques.

roles.title: Genius
roles.desc: Apple Certified Mac and iOS Technician (ACMT) with over 4+ years technical IT support experience.
responsibilities: Trained and mentored over 30+ technicians in diagnosing, troubleshooting and repairing all Mac and iOS devices.
Boosted store customer satisfaction ratings by 20% by increasing team technical skill proficiency and by leveraging existing workflows.

roles.title: Manager
responsibilities: Responsible for the overall direction, coordination, and evaluation of several departments as well as overall store sales success.
Managed, supervised and provided leadership to multiple department associates.
Interacted with vendors, prepared purchase orders, tracked status of requisitions and orders.
